content.thinking: Let me analyze this PDF document following the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can see this is a two-sided identification card from Colombia. Let me extract all the visible text: Front side: - REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA - IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL - CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA - NUMERO 72.252.799 - QUIÑONES MORALES - APELLIDOS - ALFONSO ANGEL - NOMBRES - FIRMA Back side: - FECHA DE NACIMIENTO 16-JUN-1979 - SANTO TOMAS - (ATLANTICO) - LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO - 1.83 A+ M - ESTATURA G.S. RH SEXO - 23-NOV-1998 BARRANQUILLA - FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICION - REGISTRADOR NACIONAL - CARLOS ARIEL SANCHEZ TORRES - INDICE DERECHO - There's also a barcode and other identification numbers 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** This is not BLANK (has substantial content) and not LINK_ONLY (no hyperlinks/URLs). 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The MAIN PURPOSE of this document is personal identification. It contains: - Personal biographical data (date of birth, place of birth, blood type, sex, height) - Individual identification with photograph and fingerprint - Government-issued personal identification number (72.252.799) - Official government seal and security elements This clearly indicates CECRL (personal identification document). 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This is issued by the government identification authority of Colombia ("REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA"), not a tax authority or commercial registry. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This matches CECRL perfectly: - Official personal identification document (cédula de ciudadanía) - Contains terminology like "CÉDULA DE CIUDADANIA", "IDENTIFICACIÓN PERSONAL" - Comprehensive identification details confirm its official status as a personal identification document I verify the document's authenticity through multiple unique identifiers and official markings that validate its classification as a Colombian national ID.
